title: The city bride, or, The merry cuckold a comedy acted at the new theatre in Little Lincolns Inn-Fields by His Majesty's servants.
author: Harris, Joseph, ca. 1650-ca. 1715.
publisher: Printed for A. Roper and E. Wilkinson and R. Clavel,
notes: "Taken almost entirely from Webster's, 'A cure for a cuckold'"--NUC Pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: Cropped with loss of print; defective Huntington copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
